alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 5:08PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Madison, southeastern Beaverhead and south central Gallatin Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 506 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shotgun Village in Idaho, or 8 miles southwest of Henrys Lake Idaho, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Raynolds Pass and Yellowstone Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, especially if you are camping or on area lakes, consider seeking shelter inside a building until this storm passes.
